text: The Spy Who Loved Me is a 1977 British spy action movie directed by Lewis Gilbert and is the 10th movie in the James Bond franchise. It stars Roger Moore, Barbara Bach, Curd JÃ¼rgens, Bernard Lee, Geoffrey Keen, Caroline Munro, Richard Kiel, Lois Maxwell, Desmond Llewelyn, Shane Rimmer and was distributed by United Artists. It was nominated for 3 Academy Awards in 1978. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1977 action movies Category:1970s spy movies Category:James Bond movies Category:Movies set underwater Category:Movies set in Egypt Category:Movies set in Italy Category:Movies about nuclear war and weapons Category:Cold War movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Gilbert Category:Movies composed by John Barry
title: The Spy Who Loved Me (movie)
